    • game

      public void game(String[] user, String[] newRow, String[] newCol, String[] newTurns, int newNum)
      Starts and continues a game that has been loaded
      Parameters:
      user - username of player(s)
      newRow - row position of player(s)
      newCol - column position of player(s)
      newTurns - the amount of turns that have already been passed
      newNum - number of players

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer(int move, int num)
      Calculates player movement and updates board as well as player information accordingly
      Parameters:
      move - spaces player will move according to dice roll
      num - to indicate which player is moving based on number of players
